Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01. Other Events. On October&#160;22, 2025, JPMorgan Chase&#160;&amp; Co. closed public offerings of (i) $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-Floating Rate Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;2031 Fixed-to-Floating Rate Notes&#8221;) and (ii) $3,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-Floating Rate Notes due 2036 (together with the 2031 Fixed-to-Floating Rate Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;). The offerings of the Notes were registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3 (File No.&#160;333-285537), as amended. In connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; 5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Simpson Thacher&#160;&amp; Bartlett LLP as to the legality of the Notes. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Simpson Thacher&#160;&amp; Bartlett LLP (included as part of Exhibit 5.1). 101 &#160;&#160; Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language). 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit 101).
